00056 /* uses context to figure out transform for primitive */
00057 /* returns standard diameter */
00058 static float new_primitive_matrix(bContext *C, float *loc, float *rot, float primmat[][4])
00059 {
00060     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00061     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00062     float mat[3][3], rmat[3][3], cmat[3][3], imat[3][3];
00063     
00064     unit_m4(primmat);
00065 
00066     eul_to_mat3(rmat, rot);
00067     invert_m3(rmat);
00068     
00069     /* inverse transform for initial rotation and object */
00070     copy_m3_m4(mat, obedit->obmat);
00071     mul_m3_m3m3(cmat, rmat, mat);
00072     invert_m3_m3(imat, cmat);
00073     copy_m4_m3(primmat, imat);
00074 
00075     /* center */
00076     copy_v3_v3(primmat[3], loc);
00077     sub_v3_v3(primmat[3], obedit->obmat[3]);
00078     invert_m3_m3(imat, mat);
00079     mul_m3_v3(imat, primmat[3]);
00080 
00081     return v3d ? v3d->grid : 1.0f;
00082 }
00083 
00084 /* ********* add primitive operators ************* */
00085 
00086 static void make_prim_init(bContext *C, const char *idname,
00087                            float *dia, float mat[][4],
00088                            int *state, float *loc, float *rot, unsigned int layer)
00089 {
00090     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00091 
00092     *state = 0;
00093     if (obedit == NULL || obedit->type != OB_MESH) {
00094         obedit = ED_object_add_type(C, OB_MESH, loc, rot, FALSE, layer);
00095         
00096         rename_id((ID *)obedit, idname);
00097         rename_id((ID *)obedit->data, idname);
00098 
00099         /* create editmode */
00100         ED_object_enter_editmode(C, EM_DO_UNDO | EM_IGNORE_LAYER); /* rare cases the active layer is messed up */
00101         *state = 1;
00102     }
00103 
00104     *dia = new_primitive_matrix(C, loc, rot, mat);
00105 }
00106 
00107 static void make_prim_finish(bContext *C, int *state, int enter_editmode)
00108 {
00109     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00110     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00111 
00112     /* Primitive has all verts selected, use vert select flush
00113      * to push this up to edges & faces. */
00114     EDBM_selectmode_flush_ex(em, SCE_SELECT_VERTEX);
00115 
00116     EDBM_update_generic(C, em, TRUE);
00117 
00118     /* userdef */
00119     if (*state && !enter_editmode) {
00120         ED_object_exit_editmode(C, EM_FREEDATA); /* adding EM_DO_UNDO messes up operator redo */
00121     }
00122     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_DRAW, obedit);
00123 }
00124 
00125 static int add_primitive_plane_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00126 {
00127     Object *obedit;
00128     Mesh *me;
00129     BMEditMesh *em;
00130     float loc[3], rot[3], mat[4][4], dia;
00131     int enter_editmode;
00132     int state;
00133     unsigned int layer;
00134     
00135     ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL);
00136     make_prim_init(C, "Plane", &dia, mat, &state, loc, rot, layer);
00137 
00138     obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00139     me = obedit->data;
00140     em = me->edit_btmesh;
00141 
00142     if (!EDBM_op_call_and_selectf(em, op, "vertout",
00143                                   "create_grid xsegments=%i ysegments=%i size=%f mat=%m4", 1, 1, dia, mat))
00144     {
00145         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00146     }
00147 
00148     make_prim_finish(C, &state, enter_editmode);
00149 
00150     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00151 }
00152 
00153 void MESH_OT_primitive_plane_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00154 {
00155     /* identifiers */
00156     ot->name = "Add Plane";
00157     ot->description = "Construct a filled planar mesh with 4 vertices";
00158     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_primitive_plane_add";
00159     
00160     /* api callbacks */
00161     ot->invoke = ED_object_add_generic_invoke;
00162     ot->exec = add_primitive_plane_exec;
00163     ot->poll = ED_operator_scene_editable;
00164     
00165     /* flags */
00166     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00167 
00168     ED_object_add_generic_props(ot, TRUE);
00169 }
00170 
00171 static int add_primitive_cube_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00172 {
00173     Object *obedit;
00174     Mesh *me;
00175     BMEditMesh *em;
00176     float loc[3], rot[3], mat[4][4], dia;
00177     int enter_editmode;
00178     int state;
00179     unsigned int layer;
00180     
00181     ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL);
00182     make_prim_init(C, "Cube", &dia, mat, &state, loc, rot, layer);
00183 
00184     obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00185     me = obedit->data;
00186     em = me->edit_btmesh;
00187 
00188     if (!EDBM_op_call_and_selectf(em, op, "vertout", "create_cube mat=%m4 size=%f", mat, dia * 2.0f)) {
00189         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00190     }
00191     
00192     /* BMESH_TODO make plane side this: M_SQRT2 - plane (diameter of 1.41 makes it unit size) */
00193     make_prim_finish(C, &state, enter_editmode);
00194 
00195     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00196 }

00216 static const EnumPropertyItem fill_type_items[] = {
00217     {0, "NOTHING", 0, "Nothing", "Don't fill at all"},
00218     {1, "NGON", 0, "Ngon", "Use ngons"},
00219     {2, "TRIFAN", 0, "Triangle Fan", "Use triangle fans"},
00220     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};

00222 static int add_primitive_circle_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00223 {
00224     Object *obedit;
00225     Mesh *me;
00226     BMEditMesh *em;
00227     float loc[3], rot[3], mat[4][4], dia;
00228     int enter_editmode;
00229     int state, cap_end, cap_tri;
00230     unsigned int layer;
00231     
00232     cap_end = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "fill_type");
00233     cap_tri = (cap_end == 2);
00234     
00235     ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL);
00236     make_prim_init(C, "Circle", &dia, mat, &state, loc, rot, layer);
00237 
00238     obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00239     me = obedit->data;
00240     em = me->edit_btmesh;
00241 
00242     if (!EDBM_op_call_and_selectf(em, op, "vertout",
00243                                   "create_circle segments=%i diameter=%f cap_ends=%b cap_tris=%b mat=%m4",
00244                                   RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "vertices"), RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "radius"),
00245                                   cap_end, cap_tri, mat))
00246     {
00247         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00248     }
00249     
00250     make_prim_finish(C, &state, enter_editmode);
00251     
00252     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00253 }

00255 void MESH_OT_primitive_circle_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00256 {
00257     PropertyRNA *prop;
00258 
00259     /* identifiers */
00260     ot->name = "Add Circle";
00261     ot->description = "Construct a circle mesh";
00262     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_primitive_circle_add";
00263     
00264     /* api callbacks */
00265     ot->invoke = ED_object_add_generic_invoke;
00266     ot->exec = add_primitive_circle_exec;
00267     ot->poll = ED_operator_scene_editable;
00268     
00269     /* flags */
00270     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00271     
00272     /* props */
00273     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "vertices", 32, 3, INT_MAX, "Vertices", "", 3, 500);
00274     prop = RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "radius", 1.0f, 0.0, FLT_MAX, "Radius", "", 0.001, 100.00);
00275     RNA_def_property_subtype(prop, PROP_DISTANCE);
00276     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "fill_type", fill_type_items, 0, "Fill Type", "");
00277 
00278     ED_object_add_generic_props(ot, TRUE);
00279 }

00281 static int add_primitive_cylinder_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00282 {
00283     Object *obedit;
00284     Mesh *me;
00285     BMEditMesh *em;
00286     float loc[3], rot[3], mat[4][4], dia;
00287     int enter_editmode;
00288     int state, cap_end, cap_tri;
00289     unsigned int layer;
00290     
00291     cap_end = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "end_fill_type");
00292     cap_tri = (cap_end == 2);
00293     
00294     ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL);
00295     make_prim_init(C, "Cylinder", &dia, mat, &state, loc, rot, layer);
00296 
00297     obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00298     me = obedit->data;
00299     em = me->edit_btmesh;
00300 
00301     if (!EDBM_op_call_and_selectf(
00302             em, op, "vertout",
00303             "create_cone segments=%i diameter1=%f diameter2=%f cap_ends=%b cap_tris=%b depth=%f mat=%m4",
00304             RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "vertices"),
00305             RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "radius"),
00306             RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "radius"),
00307             cap_end, cap_tri,
00308             RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "depth"), mat))
00309     {
00310         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00311     }
00312     
00313     make_prim_finish(C, &state, enter_editmode);
00314     
00315     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00316 }

00346 static int add_primitive_cone_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00347 {

00349     Mesh *me;

00355

00357     cap_tri = (cap_end == 2);
00358     
00359     ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL);
00360     make_prim_init(C, "Cone", &dia, mat, &state, loc, rot, layer);
00361 
00362     obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00363     me = obedit->data;
00364     em = me->edit_btmesh;
00365 
00366     if (!EDBM_op_call_and_selectf(
00367             em, op, "vertout",
00368             "create_cone segments=%i diameter1=%f diameter2=%f cap_ends=%b cap_tris=%b depth=%f mat=%m4",
00369             RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "vertices"), RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "radius1"),
00370             RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "radius2"), cap_end, cap_tri, RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "depth"), mat))
00371     {
00372         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00373     }
00374     
00375     make_prim_finish(C, &state, enter_editmode);
00376 
00377     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00378 }

00410 static int add_primitive_grid_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00411 {
00412     Object *obedit;
00413     Mesh *me;
00414     BMEditMesh *em;
00415     float loc[3], rot[3], mat[4][4], dia;
00416     int enter_editmode;
00417     int state;
00418     unsigned int layer;
00419     
00420     ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL);
00421     make_prim_init(C, "Grid", &dia, mat, &state, loc, rot, layer);
00422 
00423     obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00424     me = obedit->data;
00425     em = me->edit_btmesh;
00426 
00427     if (!EDBM_op_call_and_selectf(em, op, "vertout",
00428                                   "create_grid xsegments=%i ysegments=%i size=%f mat=%m4",
00429                                   RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "x_subdivisions"),
00430                                   RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "y_subdivisions"),
00431                                   RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "size") * dia, mat))
00432     {
00433         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00434     }
00435     
00436     make_prim_finish(C, &state, enter_editmode);
00437     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00438 }

00460     prop = RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "size", 1.0f, 0.0, FLT_MAX, "Size", "", 0.001, FLT_MAX);
00461     RNA_def_property_subtype(prop, PROP_DISTANCE);
00462

00466 static int add_primitive_monkey_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00467 {
00468     Object *obedit;
00469     Mesh *me;
00470     BMEditMesh *em;
00471     float loc[3], rot[3], mat[4][4], dia;
00472     int enter_editmode;
00473     int state, view_aligned;
00474     unsigned int layer;
00475     
00476     ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, &view_aligned);
00477     if (!view_aligned)
00478         rot[0] += M_PI / 2.0f;
00479     
00480     make_prim_init(C, "Monkey", &dia, mat, &state, loc, rot, layer);
00481 
00482     obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00483     me = obedit->data;
00484     em = me->edit_btmesh;
00485 
00486     if (!EDBM_op_call_and_selectf(em, op, "vertout", "create_monkey mat=%m4", mat)) {
00487         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00488     }
00489     
00490     make_prim_finish(C, &state, enter_editmode);
00491     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00492 }

00541 
00542 void MESH_OT_primitive_uv_sphere_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00543 {
00544     PropertyRNA *prop;
00545 
00546     /* identifiers */
00547     ot->name = "Add UV Sphere";
00548     ot->description = "Construct a UV sphere mesh";
00549     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_primitive_uv_sphere_add";
00550     
00551     /* api callbacks */
00552     ot->invoke = ED_object_add_generic_invoke;
00553     ot->exec = add_primitive_uvsphere_exec;
00554     ot->poll = ED_operator_scene_editable;
00555     
00556     /* flags */
00557     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00558     
00559     /* props */
00560     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "segments", 32, 3, INT_MAX, "Segments", "", 3, 500);
00561     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "ring_count", 16, 3, INT_MAX, "Rings", "", 3, 500);
00562     prop = RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "size", 1.0f, 0.0, FLT_MAX, "Size", "", 0.001, 100.00);
00563     RNA_def_property_subtype(prop, PROP_DISTANCE);
00564 
00565     ED_object_add_generic_props(ot, TRUE);
00566 }
00567 
00568 static int add_primitive_icosphere_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00569 {
00570     Object *obedit;
00571     Mesh *me;
00572     BMEditMesh *em;
00573     float loc[3], rot[3], mat[4][4], dia;
00574     int enter_editmode;
00575     int state;
00576     unsigned int layer;
00577     
00578     ED_object_add_generic_get_opts(C, op, loc, rot, &enter_editmode, &layer, NULL);
00579     make_prim_init(C, "Icosphere", &dia, mat, &state, loc, rot, layer);
00580 
00581     obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00582     me = obedit->data;
00583     em = me->edit_btmesh;
00584 
00585     if (!EDBM_op_call_and_selectf(
00586             em, op, "vertout",
00587             "create_icosphere subdivisions=%i diameter=%f mat=%m4",
00588             RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "subdivisions"),
00589             RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "size"), mat))
00590     {
00591         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00592     }
00593     
00594     make_prim_finish(C, &state, enter_editmode);
00595 
00596     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;   
00597 }
00598 
00599 void MESH_OT_primitive_ico_sphere_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00600 {
00601     PropertyRNA *prop;
00602 
00603     /* identifiers */
00604     ot->name = "Add Ico Sphere";
00605     ot->description = "Construct an Icosphere mesh";
00606     ot->idname = "MESH_OT_primitive_ico_sphere_add";
00607     
00608     /* api callbacks */
00609     ot->invoke = ED_object_add_generic_invoke;
00610     ot->exec = add_primitive_icosphere_exec;
00611     ot->poll = ED_operator_scene_editable;
00612     
00613     /* flags */
00614     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00615     
00616     /* props */
00617     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "subdivisions", 2, 1, INT_MAX, "Subdivisions", "", 1, 8);
00618     prop = RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "size", 1.0f, 0.0f, FLT_MAX, "Size", "", 0.001f, 100.00);
00619     RNA_def_property_subtype(prop, PROP_DISTANCE);
00620 
00621     ED_object_add_generic_props(ot, TRUE);
00622 }
